column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We then ordered food. I got the short rib chilaquiles. I've never had it before
column2: so can't compare it to anything. Flavor was good
column3: but the amount of short rib was lacking. My husband got the chicken fried steak; it was a HUGE portion
column4: fried nicely and topped with dark gravy. Â We also split the loaded tater tots. These were fried to a nice golden crisp and topped with deliciousness.
